means: 使烦恼，使恼怒，干扰，打扰(annoy的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: Annoyed commuters could only watch as the departure time ticked by.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着发车时间一点点过去，恼怒的上班族只能干瞪眼。

sentence.Network_en: Eleanor was annoyed at having had to wait so long for him.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃莉诺为不得不等他这么长时间而感到很恼火。

sentence.Network_en: She tapped her forehead and looked annoyed with herself.
sentence.Network_cn: 她拍打着脑门，看上去在生自己的气。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 小笨霖英语笔记本七十四至八十三 ... 刚睡醒 Just wake up 3_3 生气 Annoyed ~_~ 贪心 Greedy $_$.
八年级下册英语书单词表_百度知道 ... annoy 使恼怒 annoyed 恼怒的 polite 有礼貌的.
小小英语_百度知道 ... take a seat: 座下来，就座 annoyed: 恼火的; pay attention: 注意(在思想上).
八年级下册英语单词_百度百科 ... 327 annoy v. 使...苦恼,骚扰 328 annoyed adj. 烦闷的 329 polite a. 有礼貌的.

list.abs: 利用人的五官套在水果上，打造出「烦人的橘子」(Annoying Orange)短片，并利用社群网站打造出百万的点阅率。(画面翻摄自网路) …
...　排名4至10位的是：YouTube上的动画明星“烦人橘子(Annoying Orange)”、男用香水“Old Spice”的广告猛男、一个看到双重彩虹而 …
annoying和boring的区别_百度知道 ... Very annoying 很讨厌 How annoying 真可恶啊；多气人 Annoying Dove 讨人厌的鸽子.
中考英语复习资料_百度知道 ... *get an education 受教育 *get annoyed 变得气恼 *get indured 受伤.
另外，年轻人还用 jerk 这个字，通常是指没有社交技巧，头脑简单或古怪，令人讨厌的家伙(annoying person)，如果你不喜欢一个人…

entry.def: If you are annoyed, you are fairly angry about something.

example.ex: She tapped her forehead and looked annoyed with herself...
example.tran: 她拍打着脑门，看上去在生自己的气。

example.ex: She is hurt and annoyed that the authorities have banned her from working with children.
example.tran: 当局禁止她从事照管儿童的工作，她为此感到很伤心也很恼怒。

means.word_mean: 2. troubled persistently especially with petty annoyances;

sentences.sentence: "her poor pestered father had to endure her constant interruptions"
"the vexed parents of an unruly teenager"

auth_sentence.content: I don't tend to get annoyed by technology.
auth_sentence.res_content: I don't tend to get annoyed by technology.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I don't tend to get annoyed by technology.

auth_sentence.content: He was annoyed by the man's high-handed manner.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was annoyed by the man's high-handed manner.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was annoyed by the man's high-handed manner.

auth_sentence.content: Issa seemed annoyed that the incident ever became public.
auth_sentence.res_content: Issa seemed annoyed that the incident ever became public.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Issa seemed annoyed that the incident ever became public.

Sentence.sentence: What happened in a drug store that greatly annoyed the speaker?

sentences.en: He became excessively annoyed at〔with〕 newspaper reports.
sentences.cn: 他对报纸上的报道极为恼火。

sentences.en: He can hardly be other than annoyed about it.
sentences.cn: 他当然只会对此感到烦恼。
